name: amulet-coin
effect: Held : If the holder participated in a trainer battle, the trainer earns twice the usual prize money. This effect applies even if the holder fainted. This effect does not stack with any other similar effect.
short_effect: Held: Doubles the money earned from a battle. Does not stack with Luck Incense.

flavor_text.x_y: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.
